summary: This is a simple game tweak that increases the duration of all vanilla Bound Weapon spells to 1 hour (2 hours if dual cast). There should be no other impact on the spells.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple game tweak that increases the duration of all vanilla Bound Weapon spells to 1 hour (2 hours if dual cast). There should be no other impact on the spells.

I created this mod for myself because I play an Assassin who uses Bound Weapons. I was sick of being detected while having to re-summon my weapons, and from losing assassination opportunities because my weapons disappeared.

Though the mod is simple, I felt the subtle improvement to gameplay for conjured weapon users was worth sharing.

Please rate if you enjoy!
I appreciate any feedback.

UPDATE: Jul 14, 2012 @ 8:24pm
- Fixed Bound Bow. It will now have the correct duration.
author: Steel5amurai
